## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script workflows/ingestion/demux/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name             | type    | description                                                    |
|:-----------------|:--------|:---------------------------------------------------------------|
| --id             | string  | ID of the sample.                                              |
| --input          | file    | Input run directory                                            |
| --sample_sheet   | file    | Pointer to the sample sheet                                    |
| --demultiplexer  | string  | The multiplexer to use, one of bclconvert or mkfastq           |
| --ignore_missing | boolean | Should the demultiplexer ignore missing entities (filter, ...) |
